author: Daniel Larison
title: The Pandemic Comes to Yemen
description: After five years of dire humanitarian crisis, the arrival of COVID promises to make it worse. The post The Pandemic Comes to Yemen appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
After five years of dire humanitarian crisis, the arrival of COVID promises to make it worse.Yemen was already the world’s worst humanitarian crisis for the last five years, and the arrival of coronavirus could make it much worse in the next few months.
